Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
com.example.MenuItem
public class MenuItem extends Object
Represents a menu item in the restaurant management system.
Author:
Harsh Dave

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MenuItem(String name)
    Constructs a MenuItem with specified name.
    MenuItem(String name, double price)
    Constructs a MenuItem with specified name and price, parsing the name for size and base item.
    MenuItem(String name, double price, String type)
    Constructs a MenuItem with specified name, price, and type.

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem(String name, double price, String type)
      Constructs a MenuItem with specified name, price, and type.
      Parameters:
      name - The full name of the product (including size prefix).
      price - The price of the menu item.
      type - The type of the menu item.

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem(String name, double price)
      Constructs a MenuItem with specified name and price, parsing the name for size and base item.
      Parameters:
      name - The full name of the product.
      price - The price of the menu item.

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem(String name)
      Constructs a MenuItem with specified name.
      Parameters:
      name - The full name of the product.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the menu item.
      Returns:
      name

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the menu item.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name of the menu item.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice()
      Gets the price of the menu item.
      Returns:
      price

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(double price)
      Sets the price of the menu item.
      Parameters:
      price - The new price of the menu item.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Gets the type of the menu item.
      Returns:
      type

    • getBaseItem

      public String getBaseItem()
      Gets the base item of the menu item.
      Returns:
      name The name of the base item.

    • getSize

      public String getSize()
      Gets the size of the menu item.
      Returns:
      name.substring(0, name.indexOf('_'))

    • getDisplayName

      public String getDisplayName()
      Returns a display-friendly version of the base item's name.
      Returns:
      The formatted name of the base item.
